DOC.HEADLINE: U.S. SOCCER TEAM FACES SWITZERLAND
DOC.TEXT: The U.S. national soccer team will play host to the national team of Switzerland at noon today at Cal State Fullerton . The United States defeated Norway last week , 2-1 , coming from behind in the second_half . The Swiss have brought a strong but not fully fit team , because most teams in the_Swiss leagues are_on an extended winter break . JULIE CART
